name: Kingdom of Rus
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
attacked: Can you really call your empire a civilized state, if it was built upon the bones of so many innocent lives?
defeated: Even though you have defeated our home, the people of Rus' will never lose hope. Perhaps, this charade was worth it in the end.
introduction: I am Rurik II, Emperor and Autocrat of all the Rus'. Let us be friends.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well. All that fighting was becoming boring, anyways.
tradeRequest: As Emperor of all the Rus, I bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
